abstract: In a display of moxie worthy of Fanny Brice herself, the producers of the upcoming Los Angeles revival of "Funny Girl" announced on Wednesday that they would transfer that musical to the Imperial Theater on Broadway in April 2012, even though the show has yet to begin rehearsals.
snippet: In a display of moxie worthy of Fanny Brice herself, the producers of the upcoming Los Angeles revival of "Funny Girl" announced on Wednesday that they would transfer that musical to the Imperial Theater on Broadway in April 2012, even though the...
lead_paragraph: In a display of moxie worthy of Fanny Brice herself, the producers of the coming Los Angeles revival of "Funny Girl" said on Wednesday they would transfer that musical to the Imperial Theater on Broadway next April -- even though the show has yet to begin rehearsals.

headline.main: 'Funny Girl' Finds a Home on Broadway
